00026 #include <boost/graph/graph_traits.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/graph/adjacency_list.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/mpl/if.hpp>

00033 
00061 template < typename MutableGraph, typename RandNumGen, typename TransposedEdgeMap, typename ReverseEdgeMap  >
00062 void generate_rnd_graph(       MutableGraph& graph,
00063                                 typename boost::graph_traits< MutableGraph >::vertices_size_type V,
00064                                 typename boost::graph_traits< MutableGraph >::vertices_size_type E,
00065                                 TransposedEdgeMap edge_transposed,
00066                                 ReverseEdgeMap edge_reverse,
00067                                 RandNumGen& gen,
00068                                 bool self_edges = false )   {
00069 
00070     typedef boost::graph_traits< MutableGraph >             Traits;
00071     typedef typename Traits::vertices_size_type             v_size_t;
00072     typedef typename Traits::edges_size_type                e_size_t;
00073     typedef typename Traits::vertex_descriptor              vertex_descriptor;
00074     typedef typename Traits::edge_descriptor                edge_descriptor;
00075 
00076 
00077     //concept checks
00078     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::MutableGraphConcept< MutableGraph > ));
00079     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< ReverseEdgeMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00080     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< TransposedEdgeMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00081     //Am I missing some other concept?
00082 
00083     //preconditions
00084     BOOST_ASSERT( num_vertices( graph ) == 0 );
00085     BOOST_ASSERT( num_edges( graph ) == 0 );
00086 
00087       for ( v_size_t i = 0; i < V; ++i )
00088         add_vertex( graph );
00089 
00090       for ( e_size_t j = 0; j < E; ++j ) {
00091 
00092         vertex_descriptor a = boost::random_vertex(graph, gen), b;
00093         std::pair< edge_descriptor, bool > edge, t_edge;
00094 
00095         do {
00096           b = boost::random_vertex(graph, gen);
00097         } while ( self_edges == false && a == b );
00098 
00099         edge = add_edge(a, b, graph);                    // add an edge A
00100         t_edge = add_edge(b, a, graph);         // add the transposed/reverse edge B
00101 
00102 
00103         edge_transposed[edge.first] = false;      //register A as the reverse edge of B
00104         edge_transposed[t_edge.first] = true;     //register B as the reverse edge of A
00105 
00106         edge_reverse[edge.first] = t_edge.first; //register A as the reverse edge of B
00107         edge_reverse[t_edge.first] = edge.first; //register B as the reverse edge of A
00108 
00109       }
00110 
00111     //postcondition
00112     BOOST_ASSERT( num_vertices( graph ) == V );
00113     BOOST_ASSERT( num_edges( graph ) == 2*E );
00114 
00115   }

00138 template < typename MutableGraph, typename TransposedEdgeMap, typename ReverseEdgeMap  >
00139 void generate_wheatstone_graph( MutableGraph& graph,
00140                                 TransposedEdgeMap edge_transposed,
00141                                 ReverseEdgeMap edge_reverse )   {
00142 
00143     typedef boost::graph_traits< MutableGraph >             Traits;
00144     typedef typename Traits::vertices_size_type             v_size_t;
00145     typedef typename Traits::edges_size_type                e_size_t;
00146     typedef typename Traits::vertex_descriptor              vertex_descriptor;
00147     typedef typename Traits::edge_descriptor                edge_descriptor;
00148 
00149 
00150     //concept checks
00151     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::MutableGraphConcept< MutableGraph > ));
00152     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< ReverseEdgeMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00153     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( boost::ReadWritePropertyMapConcept< TransposedEdgeMap, edge_descriptor > ));
00154     //Am I missing some other concept?
00155 
00156     //preconditions
00157     BOOST_ASSERT( num_vertices( graph ) == 0 );
00158     BOOST_ASSERT( num_edges( graph ) == 0 );
00159 
00160 
00161     const v_size_t V = 4;
00162     const e_size_t E = V + 1;
00163 
00164       for ( v_size_t i = 0; i < V ; ++i )
00165         add_vertex( graph );
00166 
00167         std::pair< edge_descriptor, bool > edge, t_edge;
00168 
00169         edge = add_edge(0, 1, graph);
00170         t_edge = add_edge(1, 0, graph);
00171 
00172         edge_transposed[edge.first] = false;
00173         edge_transposed[t_edge.first] = true;
00174         edge_reverse[edge.first] = t_edge.first;
00175         edge_reverse[t_edge.first] = edge.first;
00176 
00177 
00178         edge = add_edge(1, 2, graph);
00179         t_edge = add_edge(2, 1, graph);
00180 
00181         edge_transposed[edge.first] = false;
00182         edge_transposed[t_edge.first] = true;
00183         edge_reverse[edge.first] = t_edge.first;
00184         edge_reverse[t_edge.first] = edge.first;
00185 
00186         edge = add_edge(2, 3, graph);
00187         t_edge = add_edge(3, 2, graph);
00188 
00189         edge_transposed[edge.first] = false;
00190         edge_transposed[t_edge.first] = true;
00191         edge_reverse[edge.first] = t_edge.first;
00192         edge_reverse[t_edge.first] = edge.first;
00193 
00194         edge = add_edge(3, 0, graph);
00195         t_edge = add_edge(0, 3, graph);
00196 
00197         edge_transposed[edge.first] = false;
00198         edge_transposed[t_edge.first] = true;
00199         edge_reverse[edge.first] = t_edge.first;
00200         edge_reverse[t_edge.first] = edge.first;
00201 
00202         edge = add_edge(1, 3, graph);
00203         t_edge = add_edge(3, 1, graph);
00204 
00205         edge_transposed[edge.first] = false;
00206         edge_transposed[t_edge.first] = true;
00207         edge_reverse[edge.first] = t_edge.first;
00208         edge_reverse[t_edge.first] = edge.first;
00209 
00210     //postcondition
00211     BOOST_ASSERT( num_vertices( graph ) == V );
00212     BOOST_ASSERT( num_edges( graph ) == 2*E );
00213 
00214 }
